environments.name: Floor
environments.about: Regular floor.

environments.name: Rock
environments.about: Typical rock. Solid, but can be dug through.

environments.name: Wall
environments.about: A sturdy wall blocking the path, providing protection and boundaries.

environments.name: Stairs up
environments.about: Stairs leading upwards to a higher level, offering a way to ascend.

environments.name: Stairs down
environments.about: Stairs descending to a lower level, providing a path to explore deeper.

environments.name: Open door
environments.about: An open door, allowing passage between rooms.

environments.name: Closed door
environments.about: A closed door, blocking the way until it is opened.

environments.name: Deep water
environments.about: Impassable water surface.

environments.name: Shallow water
environments.about: Shallow water that can be crossed, though it may slow movement.

environments.name: Lava
environments.about: Molten lava that is extremely dangerous and will cause severe burns.

environments.name: Obsidian
environments.about: An extremely hard, indestructible rock.

environments.name: Magnetite
environments.about: A magnetic rock that attracts objects in its vicinity.

environments.name: Spiky crystal
environments.about: Spiky crystals emerging from the ground. Stepped on, they may cause damage.

environments.name: Glowing mushroom
environments.about: A mushroom that is emitting a glowing light. Increases visibility range when nearby.

environments.name: Poisonous mushroom
environments.about: A mushroom that is emitting a poisonous cloud.

environments.name: Confusion mushroom
environments.about: A mushroom that is emitting a cloud that causes confusion when inhaled.

environments.name: Hidden trap
environments.about: Regular ground. Nothing special here. Or is there?

environments.name: Sprung trap
environments.about: Sharp spikes sprung from the ground. No longer hidden, but still dangerous.

environments.name: Mossy floor
environments.about: Patches of green moss on the ground.

environments.name: Chasm edge
environments.about: The edge of a chasm.

environments.name: Chasm center
environments.about: Dark and deadly abyss.
